excerpt: A creamy and delicious dip perfect for parties and gatherings.

ingredients.name: raw cashews
ingredients.notes: soaked overnight or in hot water for 30 minutes

ingredients.name: frozen spinach
ingredients.notes: thawed and squeezed of excess water

instructions.name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
instructions: In a blender, combine the soaked cashews, water, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, garlic, onion powder, salt, and black pepper. Blend until smooth.
Transfer the mixture to a bowl and stir in the spinach and artichokes.
Transfer the mixture to a serving dish and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to chill.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips for dipping.
